== Installation ==
=== Unlocking instructions ===

yuga - http://wiki.cyanogenmod.org/w/Install_CM_for_odin

=== Link to image ===

http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2434585

== Known issues ==

- Camera app rarely works.
- No Cellular connection
- Sound with speakers doesn't work

== The image ==
=== How to build it ===

https://github.com/Ubuntu-Xperia?tab=repositories

To have recovery: you need to replace boot.img in the .zip file with $OUT/android-boot.img and rename it to boot.img
